directions: Place angel food cake onto a serving platter and cover hole in the cake with the sugar cookie, pressing the cookie down to create a slight depression for the nest. Frost cake with whipped topping.
Press coconut all over the cake; decorate top of cake with edible Easter grass. Arrange mini candy eggs in the nest. Store cake in refrigerator.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
5 mini chocolate malted milk ball eggs (such as Whoppers® Robin Eggs), or to taste
title: Easter Egg Nest Cake (or Snow Storm Cake)
